item.description:
1-3 å¹´ç»éªŒå³å¯ï¼Œè–ªèµ„ 10-18k/m
è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ VXï¼šjoshw2023

Role - Front-End Developer
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of desigrwith the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the Ul/UX designwireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work witthe Ul/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementatiortaking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how itworks
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing featuresBuild reusable code and libraries for future useEnsure the technical feasibility of Ul/UX designsOptimize application for maximum speed and scalabilit
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-endCollaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Solid commercial experience in a similar role, including at least 2 year of experience workingwith React.HTML5 and CSS3Excellent HTML, CSS and JS fundamentals and build websites that are performant on moderbrowsers and devicesGood understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAXProficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around therProficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as GitExperience using unit tests or experience with test-driven development will be beneficia
